data.eml:eml: Description of the males of Euprosthenops australis Simon, 1898 and Euprosthenopsis pulchella (Pocock, 1902) (Araneae: Pisauridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cruz da Silva, Estevam L., Sierwald, Petra (2014): Description of the males of Euprosthenops australis Simon, 1898 and Euprosthenopsis pulchella (Pocock, 1902) (Araneae: Pisauridae). Zootaxa 3857: 137-150, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.3857.1.8, URL: http://www.mapress.com/zootaxa/2014/f/zt03857p150.pdf
